title: The problem with publishing an application on Windows Server 2016
body:
Hi! I have the following problem, I'm building an application on a Windows 7 computer and publish it to a machine running Windows Server 2016. Everything works fine on the local computer, but I get the following error on the server:
`The type initializer for 'SkiaSharp.SKManagedStream' threw an exception.`
Can you help? Thank you in advance
